name: $266 Million Winning Lottery Recipes: The Official L & L Hawaiian Barbecue Cookbook
description: The official L & L Hawaiian Barbecue cookbook is now available! Over 60 L & L recipes (Ooh! Chicken Katsu!) along with entertaining comics and jokes written by Eddie Flores Jr. (President & CEO of L & L) & Illustrated by me ^_^

name: Geckos Slide and Peek
description:
It’s an illustrated I Spy book featuring those rascally geckos by Jon J. Murakami.

Come on in and take a peek at all the things for you to seek!

A collection of 32 things such as: a gecko wearing a blue hat, a gecko with an umbrella, a lost penguin, and a ninja gecko, plus even MORE objects are hiding in each of the eight pictures inside. So sharpen your eyes and join the geckos on a fun look-and-find adventure in Hawai‘i.

name: Geckos Surf
description:
illustrated by Jon J. Murakami 

5 in. x 6 in.  16 pages  Boardbook  ISBN 1-933067-04-7

Ages 0-4 (actually for any age ^_^)

The 1st in the Gecko series.

It’s never too early to begin reading to your child, and this new, sturdy board book, perfect for drooling gums and curious hands, will delight even the youngest infant. Follow Hawai‘i’s most loveable creatures—geckos—found in every home in the islands as they surf, hula, ride tandem bikes, and wear funny pants.

Babies will be drawn to the simple rhythm and rhyme of the text; toddlers will love the silly, colorful geckos created by local illustrator Jon J. Murakami.

It’s about time Hawai‘i’s keiki had their own boardbooks that rival those from the mainland with stories and characters our island children can relate to.

name: Geckos Trick or Treat
description:
Illustrated by Jon J. Murakami 

5 in. x 6 in.  18 pages  Boardbook  ISBN

The 2nd in the Gecko series.

Celebrate the holiday specifically for kids by giving this non-plaque producing gift!

It’s never too early to begin reading to your child, and this new, sturdy board book, perfect for drooling gums and curious hands, will delight even the youngest infant. Follow Hawai‘i’s most loveable creatures—geckos—found in every home in the islands as they get ready for a night of tricks and treats and dress up as bats, kings, cowboys, and superheros. 

Babies will be drawn to the simple rhythm and rhyme of the text; toddlers will love the silly, colorful geckos created by local illustrator Jon Murakami. And Halloween can begin with some silly fun.

It’s about time Hawai‘i’s keiki had their own boardbooks that rival those from the mainland with stories and characters our island children can relate to.

name: Geckos go to Bed
description:
Geckos Go to Bed 
illustrated by Jon J. Murakami 

5 in. x 6 in.  16 pages  Boardbook  ISBN 
$8.95 

The 3rd in the Gecko series.

It’s never too early to begin reading to your child, and this new, sturdy board book, perfect for drooling gums and curious hands, will delight even the youngest infant. Follow Hawai‘i’s most loveable creatures—geckos—as they settle down for the night.

The concepts covered in this book is counting and you'll find yourself flipping back and forth seeing what changes occurred from page to page.

Babies will be drawn to the simple rhythm and rhyme of the text; toddlers will love the silly, colorful geckos created by local illustrator Jon Murakami.

It’s about time Hawai‘i’s keiki had their own boardbooks that rival those from the mainland with stories and characters our island children can relate to.

name: Geckos Up, Geckos Down
description:
Geckos Up, Geckos Down 
illustrated by Jon J. Murakami

6 in. x 4 in.  • 20 pages  • Boardbook  
ISBN-10: 1-933067-31-4  • ISBN-13: 978-1-933067-31-5 • $7.95 

4th in the Gecko series.

Concept covered is directions and prepositions.

Those crazy geckos are at it again! In the Geckos series of board
books comes the fourth title, Geckos Up, Geckos Down that focuses on
directions and prepositions. Once again illustrated by local cartoonist, Jon J. Murakami, who gives these little critters lots of life, energy, and humor.

name: Geckos Make a Rainbow
description:
Geckos Make a Rainbow
illustrated by Jon J. Murakami

5 x 6 inches • 24 pages 
ISBN-10: 1-933067-38-1• ISBN-13: 978-1-933067-38-4

5th is the Gecko series

Concept covered is colors

The fifth book in the Gecko board book series illustrated by local cartoonist, Jon J. Murakami will make kids laugh as they watch the geckos put together a handmade rainbow in the hopes it will stop the rain.

name: Geckos 12 Days of Christmas
description:
Geckos 12 Days of Christmas 
illustrated by Jon J. Murakami

5 in. x 6 in.  24 pages  Boardbook  ISBN 1-933067-43-8  $8.95 

6th in the Gecko series.

A twist on the 12 days of Christmas. You'll find yourself flipping back on forth to see all the changes on the pages. Fun for ALL ages.

It’s the 12 Days of Christmas gecko-style. Geckos come
bearing gifts of aloha—honking nene, bowls of chili-rice, slippers,
tiki torches, and more.Only in Hawai‘i do these crazy geckos the holidays more fun. Celebrate Christmas with the geckos this year!

name: If I were a Superhero in Hawai‘i
description:
Spark your child’s imagination by asking the question: “If you were a superhero…” and find out what your toddler would do in Hawai‘i with his or her super powers!

My 1st board book NOT with the Geckos - lol ^_^

name: The Winged Tiger and the Dragons of Hawai‘i
description:
By Phil Yeh and Jon Murakami. Colors by Lieve Jerger. ISBN 0-9755635-0-5. 

The Winged Tiger & The Dragons of Hawaii took five years for all the drawings by both artists. This delightful children's book tells the story of how five dragons came to live in paradise. These dragons were created by Hawaiian cartoonist Jon J. Murakami, who has drawn these animated characters in perfect harmony with Phil Yeh's incredibly detailed backgrounds. 

Softcover Price: US $11.95

name: The Original Poi Cats on O‘ahu
description:
Written by Geneieve Suzuki
Illustrated by Jon J. Murakmai


Join Minky Chan and Mew-lani, the original poi cats, on a whirlwind adventure across the island of O‘ahu.  It’s quite a ride when the two best friends discover all the wonderful things there are to see, do and eat as they explore their home.  The first in a series of children’s tour guides, The Original Poi Cats on O‘ahu is a must-have for visitors to the island of Oahu of all ages.  Readers will enjoy watching Minky Chan and Mew –lani learn new things about the island of O‘ahu, and learn a few new things themselves from the Poi Cats’ secret companion, and know-it-all, Machida-san. 

12" x 9" • 40 pp • Hard cover 

ISBN Hard Cover: 1-56647-718-2

$13.95

name: The Original Poi Cats on Oahu Activity Book
description:
Written by: Genevieve Suzuki
Illustrated by: Jon J. Murakami

Hours of fact-finding and island-touring fun are packed in to this activity and sticker book.  Join Minky-chan and Mew Lani on their adventures on the Island of Oahu in the story book; The Original Poi Cats on Oahu and continue the adventure in this puzzle book. 

8.5" x 11" • 28 pp • Soft cover 

ISBN Soft Cover: 1-56647-731-X 

$5.95

name: Going to the Zoo in Hawai‘i
description:
Written by: Mora Ebie
Illustrated by: Jon J. Murakami

It's time to go to the zoo! Every child loves going to the zoo -especially in Hawaii where you can walk through colorful Waikiki, wave at lifeguards and surfers, and see Duke's statue along the way. Join one local family and spend a beautiful Hawaiian day at the zoo and see hippos, flamingoes, elephants, monkeys, nene, and more. 

ISBN Hard Cover: 1-56647-790-5

Page Count	28 pages
Publisher	Mutual Publishing
Publish Date	2006
Dimensions	8.2” x 9.5”
Author	Mora Ebie, illustrated by Jon J. Murakami
Binding	Hardcover
ISBN 10	1566477905

$10.95

name: Kula and the Old ‘Ukulele
description:
Written by: Lance Wheeler
Illustrated by: Jon J. Murakami


Tutu Kane can’t afford a new birthday present for his grandson Kula, so he gives him an old ‘ukulele. Grateful and happy, Kula plays the ‘ukulele day and night. Then one day, he enters the Town Talent Show. After many performers, some big and some small, brave Kula walks on stage with his old ‘ukulele, and has the chance to make his Tutu Kane proud. This children’s book will teach important lessons about humility and generosity in a colorful, keiki-friendly format. Young readers will learn that the best gifts are the ones that allow you to give to others. Parents and children alike will be delighted by Wheeler’s lyrical text and Murakami’s whimsical drawings. 

ISBN Hard Cover: 1-56647-844-1

$12.95
